premise: A young girl with two fingers in her mouth sitting next to an older woman.
hypothesis: A young girl and old woman are sitting together.
explanation_1: sitting next to someone can mean sitting together.

premise: A woman bends down to the ground and smiles.
hypothesis: A woman smiles at her daughter on the ground.
explanation_1: Bending down to the ground does not imply that her daughter is on the ground.

premise: Man in front of a large glass building.
hypothesis: Man not in front of a large building
explanation_1: Man cannot be in front and not in front at same time
